casebody.data:
Lawrence H. BUCK et al.
v.
TOWN OF BERLIN et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 8, 2016.

Lawrence H. Buck, self-represented, and Christopher L. Buck, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Melinda A. Powell, in opposition.

The petition by the plaintiffs Lawrence H. Buck and Christopher L. Buck for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 163 Conn.App. 282, 135 A.3d 1237 (2016), is denied.
